20110109023212.000|20110109023219.000|CC1|IN THE HOUSE WAS DEMOCRATS 256, 
20110109023219.000|20110109023219.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS 179.

20110109023230.000|20110109023233.000|CC1|A TIDAL WAVE, IN FACT, THAT     
20110109023233.000|20110109023234.000|CC1|GAVE THE REPUBLICANS AND THE

20110109023242.000|20110109023245.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT HARRY TRUMAN DEFEATED

20110109023247.000|20110109023247.000|CC1|PRESIDENT.                      
20110109023247.000|20110109023249.000|CC1|ALL IN ALL, THE ELECTION WAS A  
20110109023249.000|20110109023250.000|CC1|MAJOR COURSE CHANGE FOR         
20110109023250.000|20110109023252.000|CC1|CONGRESS AND MAYBE EVEN MORE.

20110109023257.000|20110109023258.000|CC1|OF POLITICAL DIRECTION IN THE   
20110109023258.000|20110109023301.000|CC1|UNITED STATES THAT WILL HAVE

20110109023305.000|20110109023307.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS AND A LONG,         
20110109023307.000|20110109023310.000|CC1|RECESSIVE PERIOD FOR DEMOCRATS. 
20110109023310.000|20110109023311.000|CC1|REALIGNMENT.
